CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: An onset oxidation potential of 0.94 V and an onset reduction potential of -0.88 V ( vs SCE ) are observed.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| SCE (Standard Calomel Electrode) |

In this paragraph, "vs SCE" refers to the reference electrode used for measuring the potentials, which is the Standard Calomel Electrode.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| SCE (Standard Calomel Electrode) |

In this paragraph, "SCE" is the only entity that clearly refers to a material. The potentials mentioned in the paragraph are properties of this material, specifically the Standard Calomel Electrode.
